blogPost.excerpt: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
blogPost.body: Early stage fundraising is hard. Understanding any long-term repercussions make it easier. ⠀ Introducing the Carta SAFE Calculator. ⠀ In just a few clicks you can: -Calculate your future dilution -Compare the impact of pre vs. post money SAFEs
blogPost.title: Carta SAFE Calculator - Calculate your future dilution in just a few clicks
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: 早期阶段的筹款是很难的。了解任何长期的影响，使其更容易。⠀ 介绍Carta SAFE计算器。⠀ 只需点击几下，您就可以。-计算您的未来稀释 -比较资金前与资金后SAFEs的影响。
localize.tagline: 只需点击几下，就能计算出您未来的稀释率。

localize.description: 早期階段的籌款是很難的。瞭解任何長期的影響，使其更容易。⠀ 介紹Carta SAFE計算器。⠀ 只需點擊幾下，您就可以。-計算您的未來稀釋 -比較資金前與資金後SAFEs的影響。
localize.tagline: 只需點擊幾下，就能計算出您未來的稀釋率。

previous.title: Covid-19 hospitalizations in the US were down 9% over the past week, the 61st consecutive day of week-over-week declines. Down 73% from their peak on Jan 6. 🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt

localize.full_text: 过去一周美国科维德-19住院人数下降9%，这是连续61天周环比下降。较1月6日的峰值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。
過去一週美國科維德-19住院人數下降9%，這是連續61天周環比下降。較1月6日的峯值下降73%。🙏 https://t.co/4K7ryXTaOt。
